package.name: laser_camera
package.build_depend: roscpp sensor_msgs laser_geometry nav_msgs cv_bridge pcl_ros image_transport tf tf2_ros tf_conversions image_geometry camera_calibration_parsers camera_info_manager
package.build_export_depend: roscpp sensor_msgs laser_geometry nav_msgs cv_bridge pcl_ros image_transport tf tf2_ros tf_conversions image_geometry camera_calibration_parsers camera_info_manager
package.exec_depend: roscpp sensor_msgs laser_msgs nav_msgs cv_bridge pcl_ros image_transport tf tf2_ros tf_conversions image_geometry camera_calibration_parsers camera_info_manager
